hero.title: Specialized in web design & development.
hero.desc: Crafting efficient tools and memorable experiences.

services.subtitle: SERVICES
services.title: Offering services for projects that want be remembered.

final_action.caption: Still unsure what your company needs?

service:0.title: Creating your House on the Web
service:0.description: Developing a website front-end and back-end, creating web pages, blogs, catalogs, and any type of web resource, with a strong care for performance and user experience.
service:0.is_for_me: Good tool for a company that values their marketing, having a professional display of their services and products online, with strong digital marketing resources such as a blog and contact forms.

service:1.title: Designing Experiences
service:1.description: Creating a prototype for a website, in its desktop and mobile versions, and designing the User Experience of the website.
service:1.is_for_me:
Useful resource for companies that are looking to use their website to sell, convert and grow authority.
Remarkable websites make remarkable companies.

service:2.title: Maintaining and Updating
service:2.description: Taking care of keeping the website always updated and in good shape.
service:2.is_for_me: Important for companies that are looking to create a strong digital presence and expand their business.

service:3.title: Discovering your Identity
service:3.description: Offering a specialized input for existing brands and developing new brands and visual identities from scratch.
service:3.is_for_me: A good asset for projects looking for a strong brand concept and professional visual resources to start up their marketing efforts.

contact.subtitle: START YOUR PROJECT
contact.title: Make it happen.
contact.desc:
Put your idea in the real world with expertise and elegance.
Make it fast, make it yours, make it happen.

money.subtitle: MONEY TALKS
money.title:
Fair pricing,
fair job
money.desc:
Only you can know how much you are willing and able to invest in a website, rebranding or design project.
Let’s find a solution that fits your range, with the guarantee of a well-done job. In any craft, ultimately it is not the payment that matters most, but the work itself.

portfolio.subtitle: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.title: Take a look at what has been done.
portfolio.desc: Professional, tailor-made, custom-built house for a company, in the web.

final_action.caption: Curious if your idea is possible?
